terms_and_condition.body_title_use_of_the_service:
You agree to:
 . Use our services only for lawful purposes
 . Not misuse or interfere with the platform
. Provide accurate and current information
 . Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials
terms_and_condition.body_title_terms_and_condition: These Terms & Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our mobile application. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.
terms_and_condition.body_title_acceptance_of_terms: By using our services, you confirm that you are at least [13/16/18] years old or have the permission of a legal guardian, and that you agree to comply with these Terms and all applicable laws.
terms_and_condition.body_title_intellectual_property: All content on our platform, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of [Your Company Name] or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our written consent.
